As a **data-driven problem solver**, I specialize in transforming raw data into meaningful insights that guide strategic decision-making. With expertise in **Data Cleaning**, **Data Transformation**, and **Data Visualization**, As a data analyst, I leverage cutting-edge technologies to uncover trends, streamline processes, and reveal growth opportunities. My focus is on transforming complex datasets into clear, actionable insights that drive innovation, efficiency, and success.

## 🚀 Projects

1. **[Adverse Drug Reaction Analysis](https://github.com/AthrvaMule/Adverse_Drug_Reaction_Analysis)**
    - Collected and preprocessed ADR datasets
    - Cleaned and standardized medical terms to ensure consistency across datasets.
    - Visualized reaction frequency, severity, and distribution using Matplotlib and Seaborn.
      
2. **[Video Game Sales Analysis](https://github.com/AthrvaMule/Video-Game-Sales)**
    - Imported and transformed raw video game sales data into Power BI for analysis.  
    - Designed and built interactive dashboards to visualize global and regional sales performance.  
    - Identified best-selling games and top-performing genres through trend analysis.
